entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
